pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 3, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 3, 2016:

Vancouver

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the First Ministersâ€™ Meeting.

Vancouver Convention Centre
West Building
1055 Canada Place
Vancouver, BC

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:30 a.m.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a media availability with the First Ministers.

Vancouver Convention Centre
West Building
1055 Canada Place
Vancouver, BC

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
